single_crochet turn = 4 sts row 14 2 decrease = 2 sts fig 5 bind off cut yarn to desired length yarn over pull tail all the way through with tail to sew inner and outer ear together to finish the ear use tail from the inner ear to sew inner and outer ear together fig 6 & 7 once together fold in half with inner ear inside fig 8 sew outer edges together for a few row up fig 9 6 © emmy scanga 2020 **** row markers**** head it is important to leave row markers in place when you finish the head body and tummy… these will be needed for an *in body color -- crochet in row -- no single_crochet turn at the end of each row easier assembly process just insert into the stitch closest to the hook* if you do not use row markers- i will row 1 chain 10 turn = 10 sts mark the pattern where to place a 10 single_crochet in each chbp = 10 sts marker on each side of a finished row row 2 single_crochet increase 6 single_crochet increase single_crochet turn = 12 sts you can use scrap pieces of yarn just single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet repeat 3 times increase single_crochet turn = 16 sts make sure they stay in place while you crochet and are able to be removed as row 3 16 single_crochet turn = 16 sts you sew later 16 single_crochet turn = 16 sts row 4 single_crochet increase repeat 4 times increase single_crochet repeat 4 times turn = 24 sts fig 10 24 single_crochet turn = 24 sts mark 1st
